title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: The most important person you must convince youre right about anything is yourself. You could end up wasting energy trying to persuade a stranger that you need to agree on an important issue. However, your motives are not strictly altruistic today. You might be obsessively nit-picking to distract yourself from thinking about another topic that troubles you more. Focusing on the priorities that matter sets an example for everyone else to follow. Author Chetan Bhagat wrote, Be so busy improving yourself that you have no time to criticize others. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
